name: frontend
description: ## File structure ``` |   index.html |   .gitignore |   package.json |   README.md | +---css |   |   conversation.css | +---js |   |   apiHandler.js |   |   conversation.js |   |   init.js |   |   panel.js |   |   services.js | ```

scripts.worker: babel src/js/apiHandler.js --out-file dist/apiHandler.js && babel src/js/notification.js --out-file dist/notification.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/compiled.js -o dist/bundle.min.js -c -m  && uglifyjs dist/apiHandler.js -o dist/apiHandler.js -c -m && uglifyjs dist/notification.js -o dist/notification.js -c -m
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run worker && npm run uglify && npm run build-css && rm dist/compiled.js

author: shikhar
